events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and are currently reviewing your resume and portfolio.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering team as it matches the Software Developer role requirements.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to your case to assist you through the recruitment process.
The initial screening call was completed successfully, and the recruiter was impressed with your technical background and experience.
Thank you for your prompt response and availability for the upcoming interviews. We appreciate your enthusiasm for this Engineering position.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare for coding exercises and system design questions.
You completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and knowledge pertinent to our software development needs.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 3 PM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career aspirations.
The HR interview was successful, and you communicated well regarding your values and expectations aligning with our organizational goals.
We have formally proposed an employment offer with competitive salary and benefits, which you should receive via email shortly.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about joining our engineering team and contributing to projects.
You have officially accepted the offer, and we are thrilled to welcome you aboard as a Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has begun; HR sent you details regarding orientation, tools access, and your first day schedule.
All recruitment activities are now closed. You have successfully joined the Engineering team, and your position is fully onboarded.
